channel.title: Who has a good wub wub sound example?
channel.description: So some (by some I mean very little lol) people know I mainly make HipHop/ rap and now dance/funk beats. I haven’t really ventured into the whole future beat genre or whatever wubs fall into- recently I was contacted to make a beat like this one song, and it has a light wub effect in a smooth melody. I can link the song below if you’d like- but I was wondering if someone can lead me to a good example of how a wub drop should sound..? I’m learning this as fast as I can do help would be appreciated!

item.title: Who has a good wub wub sound example?
item.dc:creator: NotMiles
item.description:
https://soundcloud.com/produkmusic
This is probably a valuable resource for dem wemb wembs

So some (by some I mean very little lol) people know I mainly make HipHop/ rap and now dance/funk beats. I haven’t really ventured into the whole future beat genre or whatever wubs fall into- recently I was contacted to make a beat like this one song, and it has a light wub effect in a smooth melody. I’m learning this as fast as I can do help would be appreciated!
